name: npc_dota_hero_zuus
bio_loc: Lord of Heaven, father of gods, Zeus treats all the Heroes as if they are his rambunctious, rebellious children. After being caught unnumbered times in the midst of trysts with countless mortal women, his divine wife finally gave him an ultimatum: 'If you love mortals so much, go and become one. If you can prove yourself faithful, then return to me as my immortal husband. Otherwise, go and die among your creatures.' Zeus found her logic (and her magic) irrefutable, and agreed to her plan. He has been on his best behavior ever since, being somewhat fonder of immortality than he is of mortals. But to prove himself worthy of his eternal spouse, he must continue to pursue victory on the field of battle.
hype_loc: None can hide from Zeus, whether he's calling down a bolt to reveal the surroundings, sending an arc coursing through his nearest enemies, or summoning a terrifying volley of lightning upon all enemies. Wherever his foes are, Zeus will find them.
npe_desc_loc: Strikes enemies near and far with lightning

facets.description_loc: Static Field deals more damage to nearby enemies.
facets.name: zuus_livewire

facets.description_loc: When Thundergod's Wrath kills an enemy, it deals more damage to the other enemies.
facets.name: zuus_divine_rampage

abilities.name: zuus_arc_lightning
abilities.desc_loc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
abilities.lore_loc: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

abilities.name: zuus_lightning_bolt
abilities.desc_loc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a %sight_radius_night% radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.
abilities.lore_loc: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
notes_loc: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

abilities.name: zuus_heavenly_jump
abilities.desc_loc: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: zuus_cloud
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
abilities.lore_loc: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
notes_loc: Grants %cloud_bounty_tooltip% gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.

abilities.name: zuus_lightning_hands
abilities.desc_loc: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

abilities.name: zuus_thundergods_wrath
abilities.desc_loc:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
abilities.lore_loc: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
facets_loc: Damage is dealt to one enemy at a time, moving from lowest health hero to highest. If an enemy is killed by this ability, the damage for all subsequent enemies is increased.

abilities.name: zuus_static_field
abilities.desc_loc: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to a percentage of their current health.
abilities.lore_loc: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
facets_loc: Static Field deals more damage to nearby enemies.
